mission_data.playerShipNames_arme: TSN Sabre\TSN Valiant\TSN Lancer\TSN Stalker\TSN Viper\TSN Horizon\TSN Necessity\TSN Hunter

start.name: Start
start.gm_instructions: Welcome to the TSN Sandbox^--Activation---^The activation sequence allows the GM to choose the System and Sector for the players to start. It also sets up key variables that are tracked once the Sandbox is running.^Once the activation sequence is completed, the main Sandbox menu will appear and the GM can begin their mission. Below is a step-by-step guide to activation: ^- First, ensure all player ships have spawned before activating GM Mode.^- Next, click on Activate GM Mode to begin the Sandbox activation sequence.^- Finally, select the Operational area, System and Sector, or select the Command Base where the players will start.^- Once complete, the Sandbox will run.^The GM can restart the Activation sequence by clicking on Restart Sandbox. Note; this is only available during the Sandbox activation sequence. The Sandbox cannot be restarted once it is running.

event.name: Remove marker
event.incoming_comms_text: Loading Systems.....^Ship Status Report:^Power Levels: 100%^Engineering Management System: Online^Weapon Systems: Online^Vertical Thruster Control: Enabled^Lateral Thrust Control: Enabled^Impulse Engine Control: Online^Main Drive Control: Online^Sensors: Active...Updating sensor readings...^Communications Array: Active^All systems ready.
